Platinum Gifting!

Zoot's inviting everyone to his Platinum giveaway party! He's giving away TWO 1,000 PLATINUM PRIZES ON EVERY SECTOR!

To win, you just have to play Zoot's Loot! Every time you play Zoot's Loot this weekend or use a Zoot Token, you've got another chance to win!

Zoot's giving out OVER 50,000 PLATINUM IN PRIZES, and we'll announce the winners Monday! Visit the shop and get your Zoot Tokens NOW!
Faction Assault: Erazi Eradication!

We're extending a special offer to our experienced Edgeworld players!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Visit the Platinum Store through the 'Get Platinum' button at the top of the Edgeworld window.

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

155 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 50 / Total Platinum: 205

225 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 15 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 75 / Total Platinum: 315

400 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 25 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 100 / Total Platinum: 525

1000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 100 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 200 / Total Platinum: 1300

2500 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 500 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 500 / Total Platinum: 3500

5000 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 1000 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 1000 / Total Platinum: 7000

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!

Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 4 million Crystal and Gas.

Congratulations to Squishykins, Chawntelle, and Kuulei, the first three winners of our Platinum Package Daily Double event! They've each won double Platinum on one of their purchases!

We're choosing three winners a day, Monday through Thursday! Buy a Platinum package today for your chance to win tomorrow!

We've got another event coming up soon...watch your mailbox!

Missed the announcement of the Platinum Package event? Get the full rules here!
Halloween Weekend Events
Platinum Package Daily Double!
Tricks and Treats!
Alliance Expansion Event
Monday Winners!

Our events just keep getting better and better! We've got big Platinum prizes for every Sector available this weekend!

Zoot's Platinum Giveaway Party!

Zoot is giving away two 1,000 Platinum prizes to every Sector! All you have to do is play Zoot's Loot or use a Zoot Token, and you could win big!

Alliance Pride Event!

Give us your Alliance motto, your origin story, or show us your flag! The best entry will win a 2.5 Hour Speedup for every member in the Alliance, and the runner-up entry will receive 2 Zoot Tokens for the entire Alliance!

Visit the forums now to enter!

Boost your Level and Win!

Fight hard and level up! One player in each Sector who gains the most Levels from Friday to Monday will win a Master's Kit!

We're giving away nearly 100,000 PLATINUM WORTH OF PRIZES this weekend! We'll announce the winners Monday. Will you be a big Platinum winner?
Поздравляем! Ваш альянс с огромной скоростью захватил узлы карты в течение турнира карты Альянс! Каждый член вашего альянса получит 8-час. ускоритель!
Galactic Labor Day

Congratulations to ZombieKing! They won 1100 Platinum for upgrading their Command Center to Level 9!

KillZoneUK, Que, Garrek, Boilermaker and Avatar have won a Master's Kit for their Level 9 research and buildings!

glp, Alex David, marcel2003, TAFF, purp121, MURPH81, dr. doom, Ghozt, Empo, Ala Perizada, METOCA, pepe001, Lindber, Moemm and Grakon will receive a Warrior's Kit because they instantly upgraded their buildings and research!

Finally, Porzer, Avatar, mamme, Cosmic Death, Eosrali, Raduran, kingshawn, Het, sgt, WICKDWARLORD, PompusTwit, Scoop, RedSox, meat-puppet, bullhead, Trojan, Rebus, HydraSpy and acidmilk earned 5 Combat Strategy items! They'll be gaining levels and moving up the ranks!

Congratulations to all our winners, and thanks again for playing Edgeworld!

Want to win double Platinum? Triple? How about quadruple Platinum prizes, every day!

Each day, Friday through Monday (October 17), we're choosing two players and giving out quadruple Platinum on all their purchases that day!

More Platinum Packages means more chances to win - and you'll score quadruple Platinum for every Package you purchased that day!

Want to give a Platinum Gift instead? Even better! If chosen, both you AND your friend will receive 4x the Platinum value of your gift!

Two winners every day!

To enter, just purchase a Platinum Package from Friday through Monday. You'll automatically be entered to win!

We're extending a special offer to our experienced Edgeworld players!

Purchase a Platinum Package for the first time this weekend, and you'll receive additional bonus Platinum! This is the first time ever that you'll be able to receive bonus Platinum for our low-cost 65 and 155 Platinum Packages!

Shop for Platinum now to take advantage of this deal!

You have until 2:00 PM PST on Monday, October 24 to make your purchase!

65 Platinum Package / Normal Bonus: 0 / Additional Weekend Bonus: 20 / Total Platinum: 85

Platinum is key to your success in Edgeworld! You can use Platinum to speed up your upgrades, instantly train units, earn more XP, and much more!

Full Rules:

Packages must be purchased between 2:00 PM Friday (October 21) and 2:00 PM Monday (October 24), PST.

2:00 PM PST is 9:00 PM GMT and 11:00 PM in Europe.

This bonus is only being offered to players whose accounts are more than 7 days old, and who have never purchased Platinum before. Accounts less than 7 days old can take advantage of our Beginner's Sale to get a similar discount.

The additional bonus Platinum will only apply to your first Platinum purchase. Make it a good one!

Welcome to Edgeworld, Commander!

A leader of your caliber will go far in the battle to dominate Cerulea IV!

To aid you in these first days, we are pleased to offer a special bonus for new Commanders only: take advantage of Edgeworld Platinum and we will give you a bonus FREE Beginner's Kit with the purchase of our 155 platinum package!

The Beginner's Kit contains a variety of Accelerators to speed your building construction and troop training, tokens for the always-popular Zoot's Loot chance game and XP boosting Combat Tactics to help you level up faster and grow your power! Get your FREE bonus gift before its too late. This offer expires within 7 days of joining Edgeworld!

Click Here to get some Platinum and claim your FREE Beginner's Kit!

Once you've made your purchase, keep an eye on your in-game mail in the coming days for your FREE Beginner's Kit!

It’s time to rally and show the Factions who’s boss of Cerulea IV!

We’re keeping track of who destroys the most Maar, Helio, and Erazi Command Centers. If you destroy the most Command Centers of a Faction in your Sector, you’ll win 250 Platinum!

Three players per Sector will win, one for each Faction! We’ll also choose two more random winners per Sector who have attacked at least 50 Faction Bases!

You have until Friday (10/8) to score those victories and crush the Factions! Fight hard to win!

Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 100,000 Crystal and Gas.
Lancer Science Fair Winners

A strong Commander needs strong allies. Help your allies by sending them Platinum!

From our Platinum Packages screen, you can now buy Packages for your Alliance members or Facebook friends. You'll receive the bonus items, but they'll get all the Platinum!

A powerful Alliance can send you resources and attack your enemies, even when you're not playing. Help your allies grow!

Check out Platinum Gifts now!

Platinum Gifts are currently not available on Google+.

Thousands of Maar bases lie in ruins. The Confederacy rose up in pride, and you smashed them back into humility.

The bases and dens of the Erazi Syndicate have been cracked open, and their energy stolen. They'll have a long fight to recover from this.

The Helio Legion has retreated, unable to gain any ground against your massive counterattack. Now they watch and wait for another opportunity.

The Cerulean obelisks pulse with a powerful energy. The strongest Commanders in this sector have been identified. The challenge is complete.

The results have been tallied, and reward packages are being delivered to the strongest Commanders in this Sector. You'll have a message in your mail if you're a winner!

The planet is at peace now...surely this can last forever, right?

A mysterious challenge has gone out across Cerulea IV. The most powerful Commanders will win Energizers and Boosts!

Think you can win it? Read about the challenge here, and how to win!

Labor Day is upon us, and the show must go on! Celebrate the hardworking laborers of Cerulea IV this weekend!

Visit our Event Page to RSVP! One player who RSVPs will win 50 Platinum!

Platinum Sale

Help your workers do their jobs with Accelerators, Nanos, and Shields! Platinum is on sale!

The 225 Platinum Package is 5% OFF!
The 400 Platinum Package is 10% OFF!
The 1,000 Platinum Package is 15% OFF!

Platinum Gifting Event

You can also give this discounted Platinum to your allies!

Three players who give gifts this weekend will win twice as much Platinum for themselves, and a 24-Hour Shield for every member of their Alliance! Every gift is a chance to win!

Alliance Level Up Contest

The 5 Alliances who gain the most total levels will win an 8-Hour Accelerator for every member of the Alliance! The clock starts now!

The Labor of the Future

This Labor Day, we want to know: what will your job be like in the future? Will you be a space Marine, a Tech Lab researcher, or maybe a Crystal Miner?

Visit the Forums to share your story, and win 150 Platinum!

All winners will be announced Tuesday, 9/6. Good luck!
Quadruple Platinum Winner!

The Rhino Rampage has started! Break your enemy's defensive line with these mighty troops!

This weekend, Rhinos are free and quick to train, attack twice as fast, and only take up one space in your Warp Capacity.

Train your offensive squad, and get on the field!

We've chosen the winners for the Lancer Science Fair and sent out the prizes. If you've won, there will be a message in your Edgeworld mail. Thanks for participating!

Cerulean Technology

Halloween is almost here, and the terrors of Cerulea IV are rising. A powerful Alliance will protect you from the things that go bump in the night, and let you give some bumps of your own!

On Monday, we're picking the 3 most powerful Alliances in each sector, and awarding a 1-Hour Accelerator to each member of those Alliances!

You can have bases and Alliances on multiple sectors. Try starting an Alliance in a newer Sector, and fight your way to the top!

Prizes are awarded Monday, October 31. Ghoulishly good luck!

It's time for our next event: the Level 7 Building Blitz!

Upgrade your buildings to Level 7, and you could win a HAX-8 Speedup! Every Level 7 building is another chance to win!

25 players will win on Wednesday. Start your upgrades now!


Get yourself up to Level 7, because we're just about ready to take your base to the next level!

Take advantage of Zoot's generosity, send Platinum to your friends, and help us name the next sector! It's another exciting weekend in Edgeworld!

Zoot's Double Down

Zoot's inventory is overstocked, and he's just giving it away! This weekend, you can play Zoot's Loot twice a day!
Visit often to win!

Name the Next Sector!

Visit the forums to give us your ideas for the next Sector name!
Any names we use will win 100 Platinum!

Visit the contest thread here!

And don't forget about Platinum Gifting! You can buy Platinum for other members of your Alliance, and your Facebook friends, from our Platinum Page!

Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 250,000 Crystal and Gas.
Build and Battle Winners!

Stock up on Platinum! Starting now, every Platinum package you purchase is a chance to win double Platinum!

We're choosing three winners a day on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. (July 18-21) If you're chosen, one of your Platinum purchases will be doubled! The more packages you buy, the more chances you have to win!

You'll want to have some extra Platinum on hand soon - the Edgeworld team is working on tons of new stuff! Watch for details on new building levels, large-scale Alliance warfare, and more. Buy a Platinum package to be prepared!
Edgeworld December Events!

The Maar Confederacy was once a mutually beneficial alliance between the sovereign world governments. But when the Cerulean threat nearly destroyed civilization, the Confederacy changed from a benevolent partnership to a martial dictatorship.

The Maar Confederacy still believes that every base on Cerulea IV is rightfully part of the Confederacy, and owes them loyalty and taxes. Their aggression is a threat to the societies and economies of planets across the galaxy.

The Helio Legion and the Erazi Syndicate don't deny the growing Maar threat. In fact, they're willing to provide some 'assistance' to three Commanders in each Sector who prove the most disruptive to Maar operations.

One Commander Level 1 to 100: 250,000 Energy, 250,000 Uranium, 1 Combat Strategy

One Commander Level 101 to 500: 1 million Energy, 1 million Uranium, 2 Combat Strategies

One Commander Level 501 and up: 4 million Energy, 4 million Uranium, 3 Combat Strategies

To win, launch as many attacks as possible against Maar bases between 12:00 Saturday morning to 12:00 Monday night (PST)!

Picking on weaklings isn't sporting - only battles against bases that are at least 1/2 your level will count!

Details and full rules are in the forums! Let the battle begin!
Explore a variety of offers that include FREE Platinum!

Congratulations, Commander! The Helio Legion rose up, and you shut them down. Admiral Tenmu thanks you.

As one of the 20 Commanders in this Sector who attacked the most Helio bases, you have been awarded a 24-Hour Shield and a 60-Minute Troop Energizer!

Use your new items to wage war in the name of peace, and look forward to our next event!
Rhino Chaos Continues!

Have you read about our latest update yet?

In celebration of Alliance resource gifting, we're announcing our Alliance Expansion Event! One Alliance per Sector with the largest growth* by Monday will win a HAX-1 Speedup for every member of the Alliance!

*We're looking at percentage growth for this one. This means that smaller Alliances actually have a great chance to win this event! Can you grow more than 1000%?

We have more events happening this weekend!

Give us a 5-Star Review! Five users who give us reviews will win 50 Platinum!

Show off your base! Our favorite base will win 200 Platinum (and 100 for the runner-up!)

All the winners will be announced on Monday. Will you be one of them? Play Edgeworld!
Get your FREE Bonus Kira's Gift!
Build and Battle Weekend!
Zoot's Platinum Giveaway Party!
Halloween Alliance Power!

Thank you for your dedication in battling the Helio! The Helio Assault event ended a few weeks ago, but we missed the 60-Minute Troop Energizers you were supposed to receive. As thanks for your patience, we've added TWO 60-Minute Troop Energizers to your inventory! Have fun with your powered-up troops!

'tis the season for giving, and for winning! Give a Platinum Gift, and you could receive an equal amount of Platinum the next day!

We'll choose one Platinum Gift each day, and award the same amount to the player who sent the gift - including bonus Platinum!

Send 6000 Platinum, and get 6000 Platinum for yourself. Every gift you give is another chance to win!

One winner each day, every day, from now until Saturday, December 31! Full rules and details are on the forums. Naughty or nice - who's on your list?
Lancer Science Fair Winner!

Faction Assault Contest! Target: Helio

Urgent Message: Shields and Troop Energizer rewards for destroying Helio Legion bases! 20 Commanders win a 24-Hour Shield and 60-Minute Troop Energizer!

Details and full rules are in the forums! Let the battle begin!
Tuesday Winners!
Level 9 Contests!

Take your base and your XP to new heights this weekend, and earn prizes and Platinum!

Battle Cry!

Every Combat Boost you use this weekend (Skill, Tactics, or Strategy) will automatically enter you to win 5 Combat Strategy items! Will you be lucky enough to win the huge boost? One winner will be chosen in each sector!

Level 9 Upgrade Contests!

Our Level 9 contests continue! Upgrade your Command Center to Level 9, and you're entered to win 1100 Platinum! One player will win!

Once your CC is at Level 9, keep upgrading! Every building or research that reaches level 9 will give you a chance to win a Master's Kit! Five players will be chosen!

Instant Upgrade Bonus!

Build up your base! Use the 'Buy Now' button to instantly upgrade your buildings or research new units! Use instant upgrade this weekend, and you're instantly entered to win a Warrior's Kit! Fifteen players will win!

Winners will be announced Monday, 9/19! Good luck, Commander!

Congratulations! These winners have recieved a HAX-8 Speedup in our Level 7 Building Blitz!

bryce, Scotticus, TOTO, Dracon_X, Morphling, Deoxis, robbie hart, Mica, Opus, Gareth1971, Cyni-Kul, Birdie, Bu, jelloshepard, Degredon, TanaBanana, Capt. Kirk, Camccormick, Mandar, italiaking, Benny Ha Ha, Lightyear, Omega, Toadious, and Izorion.

These users are ready to upgrade to the next level! Will you be ready, too? Our next event starts this weekend!

Visit Edgeworld this weekend to try out the boosted Rhinos!

Don't miss any announcements - Like our Fan Page!
Faction Attack Contest Update
PvP Assault Contest!

Rhinos are on offense this weekend, and they're unstoppable!

Rhinos are free and fast to train, hit twice as often, and take up less space in your Warp Capacity! Click on your Barracks and train a team of Rhinos!

Rhinos revert to normal on Monday, so get out there and attack!

Come back Monday for our next event: The Level 7 Building Rush! Upgrade to level 7, because level 8 is just around the corner!

Daily Missions have arrived! These missions can be completed once each day, for bonus resources, XP, or items.

Your first mission is to get these Lancer under control. They're tearing up the whole planet! Our scientists have created a huge number of Salvage Boxes, and you can receive 8 Boxes for FREE each day!

All you have to do is log in and check your Daily Missions each day, now through Monday! (Oct 31) Celebrate Halloween with your own horde of Terraknor, and get ready to chow down on some bases!

The population of international players in Edgeworld is increasing! Our international players are important to us, and we're currently adding new Sectors exclusively for non-English chat. Our new Sectors will be active by the end of August!

Level 7 Building Blitz

Technology is the future! Improve your research, and you could win!

Research any troop to level 5, and you’re entered to win! The prizes get better as you improve your research:

Level 5: 15 Hour Accelerator
Level 6: 24 Hour Accelerator
Level 7: 2.5 Day Accelerator
Level 8: 4 Day Accelerator
Level 9: 7 Day Accelerator

One player in each Sector will be chosen for each level of research. Five winners per Sector total!

You have until Tuesday (10/4) to complete your research. Good luck!

2011 is almost over, and we want to finish strong! Help us reach 7,500 Followers on Twitter! @EdgeworldGame

We'll have trivia, contests, and prizes throughout December, and a special giveaways when we hit our milestones!

Our first goal is 5000 Followers. We only need a few hundred more to make it, and we'll give a Cerulean Core to our 5,000th follower!

Will it be you? Follow @Edgeworld!

The Galactic Union is gone, but not forgotten. This weekend, we celebrate our freedom from the Cerulean War, and the Commanders that made it possible!

--Platinum Sweepstakes--
Purchase a Platinum Package for your chance to win!
Twenty players who buy a $10 package will win 2x Platinum!
One player who buys a $100 package will win 5x Platinum!

--Alliance XP Contest--
Raise your flag and build your Alliance!
One Alliance in each Sector with the highest total XP gain this weekend will win a HAX-1 Speedup for every member of the Alliance. Work together to claim the big prize!

We must improve our knowledge of the terrible Lancer! Upgrade your Lancer Research by Monday, and you could win! We're giving out one prize to a random player in each Sector for each level of Research: Level 1: Combat Skill
Level 2: Combat Tactics
Level 3: Combat Strategy
Level 4: Combat Strategy x2
Level 5: Combat Strategy x3
Level 6: Combat Strategy x4
Level 7: Combat Strategy x5
Level 8: Combat Strategy x5 + Warrior's Kit
Level 9: Combat Strategy x5 + Master's Kit Increase your Research to be eligible for higher prizes. (Also, fewer players have high-level Research, so your chances to win are better, too!) Prizes are awarded Monday, November 7. Good luck! Click on your Tech Lab and start your research!

Commander, your devotion to crushing the Erazi Syndicate is commendable. The Maar Confederacy has sent Gas and Crystal to our base. They call it a 'Tax Rebate,' but I think they're just afraid of us destroying all their bases again!

Check your inventory using the Shop button to access these items.

You have received 50,000 Crystal and Gas.

It's Thursday, and that means an new round of winners!

One player who RSVPs on the event page will win 50 Platinum!

International sectors are here! Non-English users can join our new Sectors to play with other non-English players. You can also receive quick customer support in your language from Kabam's international team!

The Maar Confederacy was pushed to the brink of destruction, but they've bounced back with surprising strength. Where are their resources coming from?

Governor Maalick of the Confederacy has publicly denounced the actions of the Erazi Syndicate, calling them the largest and most powerful criminal organization in the galaxy. (Which is completely true.)

The Maar Confederacy has created a program of subsidies, tax cuts, and bonus items for the Commanders who help them gain revenge on the Erazi Syndicate.

To win, destroy as many Erazi Command Centers as you can from 12:00 Saturday morning to 11:59 Monday night! (PST, 6am GMT).

Every Commander who achieves these goals will win these items - the Maar aren't leaving anything to chance.

10 attacks: 1000 Crystal and Gas

25 attacks: 50,000 Crystal and Gas

50 attacks: 100,000 Crystal and Gas

75 attacks: 250,000 Crystal and Gas

100 attacks: 1,000,000 Crystal and Gas

150 attacks: 4,000,000 Crystal and Gas

250 attacks: 20,000,000 Crystal and Gas

Details and full rules are in the forums! Show the Erazi your might!
Get your FREE Beginner's Crate!

There is more to this world than you know. The technology of the Ceruleans can be harnessed to enhance your buildings and units, taking their abilities to the next level.

This frequency isn’t secure, and I must be brief. All the secrets of Cerulean technology and level 8 research and upgrades will soon be revealed.

We are entering a new era of this planet-wide conflict. Good luck, Commander.

Respectfully,
Admiral Tenmu

Want some free Pulse Cores and Incendiary Cores? We’re giving away cores every hour from 10am-6pm Pacific, Fri-Mon on Twitter! Follow our Twitter feed, @EdgeworldGame, to win!

Just write a Tweet about Edgeworld, include your name and Sector, and use the #Edgeworld hashtag, and you could win free Cores!

Level 9 will be here soon! Upgrade your buildings and units to level 9, and you'll be entered to win great prizes!

Level 9 Upgrade Contest!

Upgrade any building to level 9, or research any unit to level 9, and you're automatically entered to win! Five players will win a Master's Kit! More level 9s mean more chances to win!

Upgrade Your Command Center!

A level 9 Command Center isn't just a good idea - it's a chance to win big! One user with a Level 9 Command Center will win 1100 Platinum!

Instant Upgrade Bonus!

Use the 'Buy Now' button to instantly upgrade a building or research a unit, and you could win! Fifteen players will win a Warriors' Kit!

And yes: If you instant upgrade your Command Center to level 9, you're entered into all three contests!

Our contests will begin as soon as our level 9 update is out, and winners will be announced on Monday, 9/19!
Building Blitz Winners!
Today's winners have been announced on our Fan Page! Did you win quadruple Platinum today? Visit the Fan Page now!

Get your Rhinos in formation and rush the end zone!

Rhinos are in the spotlight this weekend, with free troops, reduced training time, and increased fire rate.

Rhinos are the mighty backbone of your Edgeworld game plan, so use this weekend to master these troops!

Welcome to Edgeworld, Commander!

A leader of your caliber will go far in the battle to dominate Cerulea IV!

To aid you in these first days, we are pleased to offer a special bonus for new Commanders only; take advantage of the Edgeworld beginner's sale and not only will you save 20% on our popular, 400 platinum package, you will also receive a FREE bonus Kira's Gift.

Kira's Gift is our most popular mystery crate and is not available for purchase in the Edgeworld store. Get your FREE bonus gift before its too late. This offer expires within 7 days of joining Edgeworld!

Click Here to save 20% and claim your FREE Kira's Gift with your first purchase!

The Lancers are here, and they're eating your base! Research and train these monsters, and create a Lancer attack force of your own!

Log into the game and check your Daily Missions to receive 8 Salvage Boxes each day, now through Monday!

Visit our Forums to participate in our Halloween costume and art contest!

We also have a Trick-and-Treat thread going, with Platinum prizes for participating!

It's all happening this Halloween weekend in Edgeworld!

Stock up on Platinum! Starting now, every Platinum package you purchase is a chance to win double Platinum!

We're choosing three winners a day on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. (July 18-21) If you're chosen, one of your Platinum purchases will be doubled! The more packages you buy, the more chances you have to win!

You'll want to have some extra Platinum on hand soon - the Edgeworld team is working on tons of new stuff! Watch for details on new building levels, large-scale Alliance warfare, and more. Buy a Platinum package to be prepared!

Have you survived a Lancer attack yet? They're not out for candy - they're out for blood!

Heads-up: We're preparing a great event for the Halloween weekend, and we have a big pile of treats to give away! We'll share all the details over the next few days.

Don't get spooked! Make Edgeworld a part of your Halloween plans, and find time to play each day, Thursday through Monday! (Costumes optional)

Congratulations, Commander! You shut down the Maar's dreams of expansion, and earned the grudging thanks of the Erazi and Helio.

Your prize is based on your level. Check your inventory for these items:

One Commander Level 1 to 100: 250,000 Energy, 250,000 Uranium, 1 Combat Strategy

One Commander Level 101 to 500: 1 million Energy, 1 million Uranium, 2 Combat Strategies

One Commander Level 501 and up: 4 million Energy, 4 million Uranium, 3 Combat Strategies
